english_example_sentence: When I don't play sports, I feel quite tired.
russian_example_sentence: Когда я не занимаюсь спортом, я чувствую себя довольно уставшим.
turkish_example_sentence: Ben spor yapmadığımda kendimi oldukça yorgun hissediyorum.
